ticker.name: ticker
ticker.description: Stock or option symbol representing the security.

call_put.name: call_put
call_put.description: Indicates whether the option is a Call or a Put.

expiry.name: expiry
expiry.description: Expiration date of the option contract.

strike.name: strike
strike.description: Strike price of the option contract at which it can be exercised.

mark.name: mark
mark.description: Current mark price of the option contract.

oi.name: oi
oi.description: Open Interest. Total number of outstanding option contracts that have not been settled or closed.

type.name: type
type.description: Type of option contract (e.g., European, American, FLEX options).

report_date.name: report_date
report_date.description: Date when the option contract details were last reported.
